'''Aemon Blackfyre''' is an unseen character in ''[[Game of Thrones (TV series)|Game of Thrones]]''. He is not expected to appear in the series, being long dead by the time it begins.
sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, Aemon was Daemon Blackfyre's squire along with his brother Aegon.
sections.Biography:
===Background===
Aemon Blackfyre was the second son of [[Daemon Blackfyre]], a legitimized [[bastard]] of King [[Aegon IV Targaryen]] and his cousin [[Daena Targaryen]], by [[Serena Blackfyre]]. He had two brothers: [[Aegon Blackfyre|Aegon]], his twin, who had been born first, and [[Daemon II Blackfyre]].

===[[Season 1]]===
Aemon, along with his siblings is mentioned in the [[House Targaryen]] entry of the book ''[[The Lineages and Histories of the Great Houses of the Seven Kingdoms]]''.<ref>"[[A Golden Crown]]"</ref>
